summary:
Riften tree LODs recoloured to look like close/high detail counter-part
For those using vanilla tree textures
descriptionHtml:
[size=3][color=#88ff00]Do you play RUST? Check out my new server at [url=http://www.raidiation.co.uk]RAIDIATION.co.uk[/url][/color][/size]

[heading][font=verdana]DESCRIPTION[/heading]
Riften tree LODs recoloured to look like close/high detail counter-part
For those using vanilla tree textures
Notice how the yellow trees around Riften that are far away are too bright and greyish, and dont fit in with the close up ones? If not then you dont need this
If so, this is for you! It makes the distant trees darker so they dont stick out in that weird sickly way any more :D

[heading]INSTALLATION[/heading]
Unpack .rar contents to Data\

[heading]MY TOP MODS[/heading][b]
